alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 19 at 5:44PM CDT until April 23 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse Counties. .The combination of rainfall and snow melt will result in moderate flooding at Black River Falls and Galesville. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 45.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 52.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 52.1 feet on 04/07/2001. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 545 AM CDT.
